This is a nice hotel in the center of K1 area. Close to lots of restaurants and coffee shops, and only a 10-15 minute drive from the beach. The hotel is fairly modern and clean, although there were some ants in our room. This hasn't been the case on previous stays here though. They let you park your bike outside and bring it inside a night to keep it safe. Overall a very good option if you want to stay in K1 area.

review.comment_positive: Sáº¡ch cÃ³ thang mÃ¡y

This is a relatively new hotel in Phan Rang with good sized rooms and comfortable beds. Everything is in good condition. A few km from the beach and close to many coffee shops, bars and restaurants. We have stayed here a couple of times before and will definitely stay here again in the future.

review.rating: Het Vision Hotel is een een fijn hotel met hele vriendelijke staf. Bedden zijn zeer comfortabel en ligging is goed. Rust
